title: hellosy! it's-a-me
post:
hellosy! i'm melody, gaehive manager and resident digital snakegirl! ambitious creativity is my thing-- i love telling huge winding stories through the medium of video games, but here, i think i'm going to be writing short bite-sized slice of life stories set in the worlds i've created :>
<br><br>that being said, i currently have no ideas-- writer's block is a pain... i do hope you're looking forward to what i might whip up in the future, though >.>
